SELECT t_ad.*,t_ad_group.name as group_name FROM t_ad left join t_ad_group on t_ad.group_id=t_ad_group.id WHERE 1=1
AND t_ad_group.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.groupId},'%')
AND (t_ad.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') or t_ad_group.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%'))
AND t_ad.enabled LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.enabled},'%')

SELECT t_ad_group.id, t_ad_group.name, t_ad_group.identifier FROM t_ad_group WHERE 1=1
AND (t_ad_group.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') or t_ad_group.identifier LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%'))
